name: containerregistry
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing containerregistry cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`containerregistry` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/rhysmdnz/terraform-provider-containerregistry).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing containerregistry cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:

> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,

> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-containerregistry` repo](https://github.com/rhysmdnz/terraform-provider-containerregistry/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the containerregistry package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
